name: Staycation
short_desc: The course from the website buildwithangga.com is to develop a web-based application, as the basis for learning the MERN Stack.
description:
The course from the website buildwithangga.com is to develop a web-based application, as the basis for learning the MERN Stack. MERN Stack is part of the Full-Stack Web Developer which is focused on JavaScript (Full-Stack JavaScript Developer). M for MongoDB, E for ExpressJS, R for ReactJS, and N for NodeJS. But it's not just coding, but things that are learned from the UI and UX sections.

The result of this course is a web-based application called staycation, which is a website that serves users in terms of finding a place to vacation. (buildwithangga.com)

name: Luxspace
short_desc: The course from the website buildwithangga.com is to build web-based applications, as a basis for learning to use React JS.
description:
The course from the website buildwithangga.com is to build web-based applications, as a basis for learning to use React JS. React JS is a JavaScript framework that is used by Front-End developers to build interactive and high-performance websites.

The result of this course is a web-based application called luxspace, which is a case study of an online furniture store. (buildwithangga.com)

name: Crowdfunding
short_desc: The course from the website buildwithangga.com is to build web-based applications, as a basis for learning to use Golang & Vue JS.
description:
The course from the website buildwithangga.com is to build web-based applications, as a basis for learning to use Golang & Vue JS. Vue JS is a Front-End framework used by Web Developers to build fast, light, and interactive websites. Golang is also often used as a programming language to build APIs that are consumed by Front-End.

The result of this course is a web-based application called Crowdfunding. Crowdfunding is a case study to raise funds for startups. (buildwithangga.com)
